unnormalised: Arrey yaar, he AI-chem vostu itlench vegaan cholta, nhoi? Mhaka ugddas asa mhunn hanga mhaka poilech khepen '18 vorsa zalem, titleak tem Rajinikanth-achem film kiteim asat mhunn distalem. Aata mhaka punyo, to kiteim AI tool vaprun tachem school-achem essays boroita! Tennen mhaka dakhoilem, hya app-an Indian economy-cher eakdom boreim boroilem, fattim 5 mintamnim! Ani mhaka kombrachen dhuvem, ti Python shinkta ani mhunn dilim tiki Google-an 40 lakh rupeachem package melta mhunn. Hanv aazunkui WhatsApp messages boro borein forward korpak sodtan, ani hi ballam AI bandtat. Tem ekdom vengonam, nhoi?
normalised: Arrey yaar, hi A-I vostu kitli vegim cholta, na? Mhaka ugddas asa jevhah mhaka poilech khepe don hozar atthraant tachi khobor lagli, taka polleun dislem Rajinikanth-chea filmantlem kiteim tori. Aata mhozo bhacho, to kiteim A-I tool vaparta tachim school essay borounk! Tannem mhaka dakhoilem, hea app-an poornn piece Indian economy-cher generate kelem sumar ponch minutamni! Ani mhojea voijechi dhu, ti Python shikta ani mhonnta tika Google-an ek rupia challis lakh-achem package-achem kaam melltelem. Hanv azunui WhatsApp messages koxem properly forward korchem tem sodtanv, ani hi bhurgim A-I bandhtat. Aturponnacho vishoi asa, na?
text: Arrey yaar, he AI-chem vostu itlench vegaan cholta, nhoi? Mhaka ugddas asa mhunn hanga mhaka poilech khepen '18 vorsa zalem, titleak tem Rajinikanth-achem film kiteim asat mhunn distalem. Aata mhaka punyo, to kiteim AI tool vaprun tachem school-achem essays boroita! Tennen mhaka dakhoilem, hya app-an Indian economy-cher eakdom boreim boroilem, fattim 5 mintamnim! Ani mhaka kombrachen dhuvem, ti Python shinkta ani mhunn dilim tiki Google-an 40 lakh rupeachem package melta mhunn. Hanv aazunkui WhatsApp messages boro borein forward korpak sodtan, ani hi ballam AI bandtat. Tem ekdom vengonam, nhoi?
